TopicTitle: Ejected faring - shoots off like paper from a straw, then 90 degree turn to dive into the planet

Articles.Content:
Laughing too hard to record it... But as the description the dang Thang had a mind of its own. 

First thought was 'that's a disappointing animation' (faring shooting off like straw blown paper)... But the 90 degree turn and acceleration into the atmosphere was the kicker. 

4k Med settings
Yes, I've seen this as well.  As long as it doesn't impact the vessel, I'm happy
